resources.string: Not connected to google api client
No network connection. Please connect and try again.
Sorry, you have not yet reached the correct location. If you need a hint, please click the hint button below.
Sorry, you have not yet reached the correct location.
You already completed this quest! Please press the back button to select a new quest.
No hint available for this clue
No geofences were retrieved from the server. Please make sure you are connected to a network and try again.
No quests were retrieved from the server. Please make sure you are connected to a network and try again.
Please select a quest to view its description or to begin the quest
Unable to retrieve events. Please check your network and try again.
Are you sure you want to go back to the quest selection screen? Your current quest will not be saved.
We do not currently have a location. Please try again soon
No nearby memories. Please try again soon
Please add the name of the memory uploader
Please add a description for the memory you are uploading
Unable to get your location. Please try again soon.
Unable to retrieve info about geofences. Please check your internet connection and try again.
We were unable to add your memory at this time. Please try again later.
You are on a quest! Go to the location that you think the clue leads to and click "Found it!" to unlock the next clue! If you need a hint, select the "HINT" button.

Map markers will appear for points of interest near your location as you walk around campus. To learn more about the history and function of that location, click the marker! You can also click the "Get Nearby Memories" button to see images that users uploaded near your current location. If you wish to add your own memory, click on "Get Nearby Memories" and then click "Add Memory" and fill out the required fields.
Select a quest that looks interesting, then go to the location the clue hints at to unlock the next clue!
